guestModal.title: You have been invited as a collaborator
guestModal.text1: As a collaborator you will be able to manage projects, access administrative tools, and work alongside the assigned team.
guestModal.text2: Please set up your account information and add a password

card1.text1: An environment designed for your operation
card1.text2: EncodeBiz brings together in a single environment the technology that makes your company work.
card1.text3: Clearer processes, connected data, and a digital base ready to grow with your services.

card2.text2: Before activating any of the encodeBiz services, we need to complete the configuration of your entity. This ensures that each module works with the correct data and is adapted to your organization.
card2.text3: Configuring your entity allows you to:
card2.text5: Apply your organization's corporate identity across all services and modules, ensuring a consistent experience for your team.
card2.text7: Unify your entity's key data so it's available in documents, processes, reports, and configurations of every service you activate.
card2.text9: Comply with legal and data protection requirements, ensuring each service operates transparently and in accordance with regulations.

card3.text4: The system to issue and manage digital credentials and accesses in a unified environment.
card3.text5: It will allow creating credentials, managing access, and controlling events with security and immediate digital validation.
card3.text8: Issue digital credentials for employees, students, or customers.
card3.text9: Create and manage events with passes for attendees and staff.
card3.text12: The solution that analyzes and structures the real work behavior of your teams.
card3.text13: Obtains shift records, validates them with operational context, and generates clear traceability to support real-time decisions.
card3.text16: Register shifts with geolocation and validate their context.
card3.text17: Understand work patterns and work dynamics.
card3.text18: Visualize teams, projects, and schedules with real structure.
card3.text19: Generate actionable reports and data in real time.

stats.passesIssuedText: Distribution of issued passes in stacked bars by events or credential
stats.passesValidation: Validation: Attempts vs Successes vs Revoked Validated Passes
stats.passesValidationText: Distribution of valid, failed, and revoked passes in stacked bars by events or credential
stats.empthytext: Adjust the filters with the parameters you need to graph information

statsCheckbiz.advise: You must select at least one branch/project to see statistics.
statsCheckbiz.loading: Processing and preparing data to display
statsCheckbiz.avgWeekWorkHelp: Average start and end shift time (in decimal format)
statsCheckbiz.avgStartEndHelp: Average start and end shift time (in decimal format)
statsCheckbiz.avgCostHourHelp: Average cost per hour calculated using EMA (heuristic smoothed)
statsCheckbiz.avgCostEfficiencyHelp: Relationship between cost and productivity (higher = more efficient)
statsCheckbiz.avgCycleCostHelp: Average cost per production or activity cycle

employeeDashboard.emptyPattern: No attendance patterns available to show in the employee profile
employeeDashboard.dispertionText: Weekly dispersion comparison, shows the level of real variability in the employee's entry and exit times throughout the week.
employeeDashboard.hourOperationText1: Data showing how the employee works in terms of schedules, workload, and consistency of their records.
employeeDashboard.hourOperationText2: Helps understand their operational stability, actual use of time, and reliability of the information recorded in their shifts.
employeeDashboard.ruleText: Automatic diagnosis that interprets the worker's real behavior and generates clear conclusions about their performance, stability, and potential within the team. Allows identifying talent, operational risks, and improvement opportunities based on objective data.
employeeDashboard.tempActivity11: Daily variation of the average shift start time.
employeeDashboard.tempActivity22: Daily variation of the average shift end time.
employeeDashboard.tempActivity33: Daily evolution of the average total hours worked.
employeeDashboard.stabilityDesc: Usual start and end time according to the branch's real behavior. The system analyzes complete shifts and obtains a stable time pattern.
employeeDashboard.weeklyHoursDesc: Hours worked per week. Values are based on the real trend of weekly functioning.
employeeDashboard.hourDispersionDesc: Average time dispersion of employee entry and exit to measure punctuality, reliability, and consistency.
employeeDashboard.costHourDesc: Average cost associated with each effective hour of real activity.
employeeDashboard.costCycleDesc: Approximate cost of a full day of activity, based on the branch's real behavior.
employeeDashboard.costEffectiveDesc: Standard measure that summarizes the stability and efficiency of the real shift. Allows comparing branches based on how they function, regardless of their activity.
employeeDashboard.costEfficiencyDesc: Measures how the invested money performs, taking into account schedule pattern, regularity, and stability. A high value indicates good operational cost utilization.
employeeDashboard.totalCostDesc: Total estimated cost generated by the analyzed shifts, considering schedule pattern, regularity, and stability of behavior.
employeeDashboard.confidenceDesc: Pattern reliability level based on the amount and consistency of analyzed data.
employeeDashboard.observationsDesc: Number of valid work shifts used to build the operational trend.
employeeDashboard.tempActivity1Desc: Average time at which work shifts usually begin. Reflects the habitual start behavior over time.
employeeDashboard.tempActivity2Desc: Average time at which work shifts usually end. Shows the general trend of shift closure.
employeeDashboard.tempActivity3Desc: Average number of effective hours per shift. Allows seeing if the daily workload is stable or presents variations.
employeeDashboard.heuristicText1: Indicators showing how the branch functions in terms of schedules, costs, and data quality.
employeeDashboard.heuristicText2: Allows understanding operational stability, actual use of resources, and reliability of recorded information.
employeeDashboard.hourText: Comparison of time behavior between branches/projects. Values are normalized on a 0–100 scale, where higher values indicate greater operational stability, better time organization, and a more consistent distribution of hours.
employeeDashboard.dataConfiabilityText: Comparison of operational data quality and stability between branches/projects. Values are normalized on a 0–100 scale, where higher values indicate greater consistency, lower variability, and more reliable data for decision making.
employeeDashboard.costsText1: Comparison of economic performance between branches/projects.
employeeDashboard.costsText2: Values are normalized on a 0–100 scale, where higher scores represent more efficient use of resources, lower deviations, and a better cost-productivity balance.
employeeDashboard.emptyBranch: You must select at least one branch/project to see statistics.
employeeDashboard.helpPanelEmpty: There is currently insufficient operational information generated to display in the comparison panel. Once the selected branches/projects begin to register attendance and operational data, you will be able to view detailed and comparative analyses here.
